channel.title: Decimation - Webclient - Just Pking (Previous owner of Deci 508 / D-Z317)
channel.description:
[center] [img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2wq6crt.gif[/img]
[COLOR="silver"]Notice:[/COLOR]
[ul]I have just began on this source, it is based on Project Insanity and I know I have not done alot of changes to it yet.[/ul]
[ul]There will be changes done to it as time goes on, if you've played my previous Decimation servers (My 508 or 317), or D-Z317, you know what I am capable of.[/ul]
[ul]This will not contain PvP Armour such as Morrigans/Zuriels/Statius/Vesta but will contain some other new school items[/ul]
[ul]NEW HITS ARE TOGGLEABLE WITH ::HITSOFF AND ::HITSON!!!![/ul]
[color="blue"]Downloadable client:[/COLOR]
[SIZE="5"]Media:[/SIZE]
Starter: (2 per ip)
[img]http://imgur.com/xT7vY.png[/img]
Shops:
[img]http://i51.tinypic.com/21kjq0h.png[/img]
NPC communicating:
[img]http://i55.tinypic.com/2m460ef.png[/img]
Duel Arena:
[img]http://i52.tinypic.com/2bckyg.png[/img]
Obelisks:
[img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2hehts4.gif[/img] [/center]
